description:
From our law office in Orlando, Florida, the attorneys at The Umansky Law Firm are fully committed to helping you obtain justice for your serious and pressing legal challenges.

Serving a diverse range of clients throughout Central Florida, we possess more than 60 years of combined legal experience among us, making us well-suited to handle your complex legal needs with regards to criminal defense and personal injury law.

Regardless of the seriousness of the criminal charges against you, our law firm's seasoned and highly rated trial attorneys will fight hard on your behalf to help you secure the most favorable outcome for your situation. Understanding the fear and anxiety you are likely experiencing regarding your circumstances, we promise to remain with you throughout all legal proceedings, always working to protect your rights and interests while helping to mitigate the potential consequences you may face and preserve your freedom.

As staunch advocates for justice, we have achieved unprecedented success helping innocent accident victims and their families obtain the maximum amount of compensation possible for their injuries and losses, recovering millions of dollars in settlements and awards for those in need.

Regarded as one of the top legal practices in the state devoted to criminal defense and personal injury law, we have earned the respect of both our clients and peers alike, and you can trust we will do everything we can to help you through your difficult and uncertain time.

For more information, you can contact The Umansky Law Firm by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule a free initial consultation.
